ygData.subject: Re: mip = many innapropriate pictures?
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve found that to be true.  The advantage of Glide is that you can tweak the gamma to brighten things up... Slyde ... From:  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I've found that to be true. The advantage of Glide is that you can tweak
the gamma to brighten things up...

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, February 28, 2000 11:25 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] mip = many innapropriate pictures?


> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Mon, 28 Feb 2000, Daniel P. Sniderman wrote:
> >
> > Another option is to use Direct 3D as opposed to Glide...
>
> Has anyone else found that with the Voodoo3 cards, Direct 3D
> actually produces a higher framerate than Glide? The major
> annoyance being sawtoothing of texture edges in the distance
> (an acknowledged bug due to the V3's smaller Z-axis buffer),
> and the mouse jumping into accelerated mode every time disk
> activity drops your framerate.
>
